Room.Name: Rosecrest Street/Overland Drive Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Overland Drive and Rosecrest Street.
Room.LongDescription: Rosecrest Street is parallel to the great City Wall on the west. The waters of Nylandian Bay are on the other side of the wall, and before the wall was built the sea would often swell up and flood the city, destroying everything in its path. Overland Drive heads east from this point, and connects the commercial and administrative areas located in this area to the estates of the rich and powerful farther east.
